name: Yarnmania
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure of a ball of blue yarn. Being rolled into a ball has never been the ideal life of a yarn and it would be amazing to just stretch out and loaf around. Get that ball of yarn rolling until it is a ball no more, find exciting items on your adventure with surprising and exploding properties. The faster the ball rolls the faster the yarn unrolls!

Made by Zas & Slask

Slask: https://slaskprask.itch.io/
